title: Garden Spur
text: Garden Spur () is a spur on the west side of the <a href="Longhorn%20Spurs">Longhorn Spurs</a>, south of <a href="Cape%20Surprise">Cape Surprise</a>, Antarctica. It was so named by the Southern Party of the <a href="New%20Zealand%20Geological%20Survey%20Antarctic%20Expedition">New Zealand Geological Survey Antarctic Expedition</a> (1963–64) because of the rich <a href="flora">flora</a> of mosses, algae, and lichens found there.
